title: But what about spelling?
creator_credit: Vincent Donovan, Chris Tibballs, Julie Shepherd and Materials Production Dandenong School Support Centre
brief_description: A video to assist teachers with the development of balanced spelling programs. Spelling is seen as a problem solving process and the focus is on strategies for learning to spell within context rather than on rote learning of words.
creator_credit_for_label: Vincent Donovan, Chris Tibballs, Julie Shepherd and Materials Production Dandenong School Support Centre
